name: Iridescent
description:
Iridescent v2.0 is an expanded post-jam version of my Ludum dare 32 compo entry. The game focuses on solving puzzles, fighting enemies and exploration. More contents and stuff has been added for stencyl jam 2015.

Use the spectrite stones and your trusty slingshot in your quest to find the cure that could save your sister.

Controls: (Press TAB ingame to view Controls)
A,D - Move left and right
W, Space Bar - Jump
Left Shift - Dash
E - Bless Crystals
Mouse - Aim and shoot, hold left mouse button to pull slingshot.
R - Restart Level
P - Pause
M - Mute
